refsection.title: Introduction
refsection.para: This step extracts triples from documents marked up with RDFa.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The cx:rdfa step uses the Semargl libraries to extract triples from documents marked up with RDFa.

The output from the RDFa step is always application/rdf+thrift, a binary format suitable for further RDF processing. To view or save results, it will often be necessary to cast the results to some other RDF content type.

refsection.title: Limitations
refsection.para: The Semargl library does not provide any access to the in-scope namespace bindings. Consequently, itâ€™s impossible to tell what datatypes are being used. The cx:rdfa step assumes that they are XML Schema data types, irrespective of their prefix.
